project.name: factory.methods.chart.creator
project.description:
We would like to create a chart creator application. A chart should be printed into a File in various formats such as JPG, PNG, SVG, EPS etc. A Chart should present one or more functions in a given interval. Scales of the X and Y axes could be configured (linear, logarithmic, etc). The available functions are predefined (polynomial, trigonometric, etc.). Each function convert a real value into a real value i.e. f:R->R.
This is a primitive version of gnuplot :)
